name: ipfs-common-shake
description: Does common-shake save some bytes when bundling IPFS?

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production browserify -g uglifyify index.js | uglifyjs -c > bundle.js
scripts.build:shake: NODE_ENV=production browserify -p [ common-shakeify -v ] -g uglifyify index.js | uglifyjs -c > bundle.js

author: Alan Shaw
